title: Budget to be held in November, government announces
text:
Boris Johnson's government will announce a new budget on 6 November, Sajid Javid has said.

The chancellor suggested the budget would take place after Brexit, despite parliament passing a rebel bill that compels ministers to request an extension of article 50 by 31 October.

“This will be the first Budget after leaving the EU," Mr Javid said.
